root.name: Mickey Mouse: The Computer Game
root.description: One of the earliest video game incarnations of the popular Disney character pits the mouse against and evil ogre who is trying to bend the Disney castle to his will. The game plays out similar to a platformer but instead of sidescrolling, the protagonist ascends the tower vertically, avoiding and fighting all sorts of foes. Some of the leves are played from a top-down perspectives as well. Even though the game is based on the Disney character, the setting and other creatures/characters do not resemble those that populated the Disney cartoons or animated shorts.
